detail_desc: 5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Short cold shoulder dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Short flounced sleeves that are elasticated at the top and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Fitted top in viscose jersey with decorative buttons at the front, a low neckline and short sleeves.
Short-sleeved tops in cotton jersey. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
Pre-tied bow tie in a textured silk weave with an adjustable metal fastener at the back. Width 12 cm.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a ribbed V-neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a seam half way down. Unlined.

Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a detachable pile collar, buttons down the front, welt side pockets and flap chest pockets with a button. Buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled cotton.
Jacket woven in a textured cotton blend with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and no fasteners. Lined.
Trousers in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a high waist that is elasticated at the back, side pockets, and wide, straight legs with slits at the hems.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Ballet pumps in patterned imitation leather with a grosgrain trim around the top, an elastic strap over the foot and a bow at the front. Patterned satin linings and insoles the thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Hipster briefs in ribbed microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Velour dress with a collar, buttons at the back and short puff sleeves. Seam at the top with a sewn-on bow and a double-layered skirt with two layers of tulle.
Printed sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Top, hooded jacket and a pair of joggers in soft organic cotton. Jacket with a lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a bodysuit in soft jersey and an elasticated hairband with a glittery tulle bow. Bodysuit with long puff sleeves, a bow at the waist and a skirt in three layers of glittery tulle. Press-studs at the shoulder and crotch.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar with a drawstring, and a V-shaped opening at the front.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with flounces. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with a round neck, buttons down the front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Short shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Scarf in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing along the short sides. Size 30x200 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a drawstring at the sides and medium coverage at the back.

Top and a pair of shorts in soft jersey. Sleeveless top with a glittery print motif and frills along the shoulders straps. Shorts with side pockets and an elasticated waist with a small frill trim and decorative bow.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Pleats at the shoulders, a concealed zip at the back and a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Discreet side pockets and tapered legs with creases and short slits at the hems. Lined at the top.
Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative metal studs. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Espadrilles in a textured knit with a braided jute trim around the soles, an elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and rubber soles.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved dress in a stretch, patterned viscose blend with an embroidered heart on the front, a gathered seam at the bottom and a flared skirt.
Wide, ankle-length jeans in lightweight denim with side and back pockets and a frill-trimmed waist with elastication at the back and sewn-on bow at the front.
Shorts in soft slub cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in an airy, patterned viscose weave. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a button placket. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button and slim legs with decorative seams and narrow hems.

Long-sleeved bodysuit in cotton jersey and a pair of dungarees in soft velour corduroy. Bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Dungarees with adjustable fasteners at the front, a chest pocket, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y), and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a high, ribbed stand-up collar with a zip at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Large metal earrings decorated with sequins, beads, fabric flowers and pompoms. Length 14 cm.

Jeggings in superstretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and back pockets. The cotton content of the jeggings is partly recycled. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a motif. Soft brushed inside.
Cap in cotton twill with an inner sweatband and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details and a smart stretch function so that the shorts embrace the body for a comfortable and flattering fit. High waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Joggers in soft, fine-knit cashmere. Regular waist with covered elastication and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Shopper in braided paper straw with two imitation leather handles at the top. Diameter at the base approx. 27 cm, height approx. 27 cm.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill. Slightly looser fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side and back pockets. Legs with decorative stitching, quilted sections and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shorter, double-knitted jumper in a soft wool blend with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

V-neck sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide shoulder straps, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, and a racer back. Medium support. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and elastication and a wide flounce around the neckline. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist. Unlined.
Cotton canvas shoes with lacing at the front, rubber toe caps, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Body in jersey with a yoke and sleeves in mesh. Opening at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Shortie briefs in microfibre with laser-cut edges, a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Hairband woven in a cotton blend with a sewn-on bow on the front and covered elastic at the back.
Calf-length trousers in pleated jersey with a sheen. High waist with elasticated smocking, and wide, straight legs.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Wide elastic trim at the hem and no fasteners.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, sewn-on tie belt, elastication at the back and pleats at the top. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Cotton cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
Long, circular skirt in a woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with a zip and button at one side.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede flap with a compartment and decoration on the front and magnetic fastener. Narrow shoulder strap at the top and card compartments inside. Lined. Size approx. 5x11x17 cm.
Hair clips in metal and plastic. Width 0.5 cm, length 6 cm.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Moccasins in soft faux fur with high shaft, a hook and loop fastening at the back and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Lined at the front. Medium support.
Cardigan in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, one-shoulder dress in a patterned viscose weave with a short, flounced sleeve, frill-trimmed, covered elastication at the top and smocking at the waist. Seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Boots in waterproof, functional fabric. High shaft with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the front and an elasticated drawstring at the top. Removable, quick-dry fleece lining. Reflective details. The boots have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Joggers in soft cotton twill with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and side pockets. Gently tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems. One patterned pair.
Chinos in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
Shirt in cotton flannel with a detachable, lined hood in jersey. Press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, a chest pocket with a press-stud and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short coat in a textured weave with a fringe trim, open front and patch pockets. Unlined.

Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details. Hood, zip down the front, long sleeves with ribbing and thumbholes at the cuffs and a chest pocket with a taped zip. Rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Sports top in heavy jersey with taped details. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, short sleeves with ventilation holes under the arms, a kangaroo pocket, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
